## Source: ossf-package-analysis (10eb10880328aea55a7c7620d283f145ebcb574bfc98567eef9ad44d1ee8fcdb)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'poc-nvk' @ 0.1.2 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
